dir.description: The direction of the color picker

disabled.description: Whether the color picker is disabled

getRootNode.description: A root node to correctly resolve document in custom environments. E.x.: Iframes, Electron.

id.description: The unique identifier of the machine.

onChange.description: Handler that is called when the value changes, as the user drags.

onChangeEnd.description: Handler that is called when the user stops dragging.

readOnly.description: Whether the color picker is read-only
